_json.gridTitle: DOstamperSTARS Challenge #173: Mini Drapery Fold with A Nice Cuppa
_json.description: Mini Drapery Fold/Skirt Pleat | 6" x 1-3/4" piece of Pretty Petals DSP Stack. Score at 3-1/4", 3-3/4", 4-3/4", & 5-1/8". Turn and put a "tick mark" at 7/8". Cut from the 7/8" mark to the 3-1/4" score line. Fold back and forth at each score line - like a fan fold. Adhere to card panel 4" x 5-1/4". There may be a slight overhang on the right side, just trim off with scissors. Decorate with teapot and tag cut with Cups & Kettles Framelits. The small heart was cut using the Owl Builder Punch.
